thread.title: Philippines-based militant group Abu Sayyaf beheads German hostage - SITE
thread.title_full: Philippines-based militant group Abu Sayyaf beheads German hostage - SITE

title: Philippines-based militant group Abu Sayyaf beheads German hostage - SITE
text:
6:06 PM Philippines-based militant group Abu Sayyaf beheads German hostage - SITE 
CAIRO (Reuters) - The Philippines-based militant group Abu Sayyaf posted a video on Monday showing the beheading of a man identified as a German hostage captured last November. 
The video reposted by the militancy-monitoring group SITE showed a machete-wielding militant kill the elderly German hostage. SITE identified the man as Jurgen Kantner. 
Abu Sayyaf is believed to be holding a number of hostages and has freed several in return for ransom payments. Kantner's deadline for ransom had expired on Sunday, according to SITE. 
(Reporting by Ali Abdelaty; Writing by Eric Knecht; Editing by Toby Chopra) <>
